FuncDef: This command configures the network policy scope as exclusive or template. The policy s scope cannot be changed if the policy is applied to an interface.

ParaDef.Info: When the scope of a policy is defined as exclusive, the policy can only be applied to one interface. If a policy with an exclusive scope is assigned to a second interface, an error message is generated. If the policy is removed from the exclusive interface, it will become available for assignment to another exclusive interface.
When the scope of a policy is defined as template, the policy can be applied to multiple interfaces on the router.
